alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:56PM CST until January 12 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CST FOR LOWNDES...SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS AND WESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 156 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Coosada to near Pine Apple, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Coosada, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Beechwood, Auburn University In Montgomery, Bob Woodruff Lake, Woodcrest, Maxwell Air Force Base, Snowdoun, Davenport, Lagoon Park and Pintlala. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
